text: Willis David "Bill" Gradison Jr. (born December 28, 1928) is an American politician from Ohio. He served in the United States House of Representatives from 1975 to 1993. ==References== ==Other websites== * Category:1928 births Category:Living people Category:Mayors of Cincinnati Category:United States representatives from Ohio Category:Jewish American politicians Category:Republican Party (United States) politicians Category:Businesspeople from Cincinnati
title: Bill Gradison
